item.title: JSON schema inferenceÂ with Apache Spark
item.description: post-publishing announcement please check out a library I’ve authored that does this for you. title breakdown JSON: JavaScript Object Notation, a popular semi-structured data interchange format schema inference: the process of using a computer to derive the emergent structure of semi-structured Apache Spark: a popular [[Open Source]] query execution engine a quick note This post is not about inferring the schema of JSON files, as that issue is already solved with native DataFrameReader functionality.
